tool_description: Credit card number validator or generator

api_list.name: Validate Credit Card Number
api_list.description: This endpoint validates whether a credit card number is valid or not.

api_list.name: Generate Fake Credit Card Number
api_list.description: This endpoint generates a fake and valid credit card number with the desired length.

required_parameters.name: cardLength
required_parameters.description: The length of the generated credit card number.
